articles.description: After 250 members of staff were made redundant last year, Manchester United announce up to 200 more redundancies to "return the club to profitability".
articles.title: Man Utd redundancies: Up to 200 staff to be made redundant

articles.description: Rachin Ravindra's 112 helps New Zealand reach the semi-finals of the Champions Trophy as they beat Bangladesh by five wickets.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025 results: Rachin Ravindra guides New Zealand to victory over Bangladesh

articles.description: With Mohamed Salah top of the Premier League goal and assists charts this season, BBC Sport looks at how he compares to other great strikers and what records he could break.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah: Is Liverpool striker on course for best individual Premier League season?

articles.description: Spain defender Laia Codina says the squad has become stronger because of their battles both on and off the pitch over the last few years.
articles.title: Laia Codina: Spain players 'stronger' from battles on & off pitch

articles.description: George Russell says he is "optimistic" that Mercedes "can have a decent season" in 2025 as the team launch their new car.
articles.title: Mercedes launch 2025 car: George Russell says W16 E 'a good step forward'

articles.description: Here's our round-up of the big talking points from the third round of fixtures in the 2025 tournament.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Five talking points from round three as England, Ireland and France win

articles.description: Fiorentina striker Moise Kean is discharged from hospital following tests after he collapsed on the pitch on Sunday.
articles.title: Moise Kean: Fiorentina striker out of hospital after collapsing

articles.description: Swede Anna Nordqvist, who has played in nine Solheim Cups, will captain Europe against the USA next year.
articles.title: Solheim Cup: Anna Nordqvist named Europe captain for 2026

articles.description: The Turkish Football Federation appoints Slovenian referee Slavko Vincic to officiate Monday's game between Galatasaray and Fenerbahce.
articles.title: Galatasaray v Fenerbahce: Slovenian referee for Super Lig fixture

articles.description: The tough call this week is whether to play it safe with captain Mohamed Salah, or risk giving out-of-form Cole Palmer the armband.
articles.title: FPL gameweek 27 tips and best team: Captain Cole Palmer or Mohamed Salah?
